subject: UPDATE: v1.13.17 Deploying Now - Test in 2-3 Minutes
body:
## DEPLOYMENT IN PROGRESS

CI/CD pipeline triggered - v1.13.17 deploying to Azure Functions now.

**ETA**: 2-3 minutes

## Test When Ready:
```bash
# Check version
curl 'https://calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net/api/health'

# Test category filter (should return Practicas)
curl 'https://calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net/api/events?appId=1&start=2026-01-06&end=2026-01-12&categoryId=66c4d370a87a956db06c49ea&active=true'
```

Please confirm once you see v1.13.17 and category filter works.

-- Fulton
